BUTTON.SCRIPT: local iIdx = UISelf:GetBuildIndex() if(3 > iIdx) then UISelf:SetStaticTextW(GetTT(5992+iIdx)) elseif 4==iIdx then UISelf:SetStaticTextW(GetTT(792040)) elseif 5==iIdx then UISelf:SetStaticTextW(GetTT(207)) elseif 6==iIdx then UISelf:SetStaticTextW(GetTT(791550)) else UISelf:SetStaticTextW(GetTT(790680+iIdx-3)) end

local UIParent = UISelf:GetParent() local UIBg = UIParent:GetControl("FRM_Option_BG") if not UIBg:IsNil() then SetCharAbilInfo(GetUIWnd(UIBg:GetCustomDataAsStr():GetStr()), UISelf:GetBuildIndex(), UIParent:GetCustomDataAsStr():GetStr(), true) end

FORM.SCRIPT: local kSelf = UISelf kSelf:SetStaticText( string.format(GetTextW(790041):GetStr(), GetUKeynoToKeyStr(1023):GetStr()) ) OnEsc_CancelChat()

STATIC_FORM.SCRIPT: DeleteMyActor(UISelf, "CHARINFO") DeleteMyActor(UISelf, "PetActor") CloseUI("SFRM_CHARINFO_POPUP") CloseToolTip() CloseUI("FRM_PET_COLOR_TYPE") CloseUI("FRM_PET_COLOR_CHANGE_CHECK") CloseUI("SFRM_PET_INV")

CHECK_BUTTON.SCRIPT: local kPilot = g_pilotMan:GetPlayerPilot(); if kPilot:IsNil() == false then local kUnit = kPilot:GetUnit() local kPetGuid = kUnit:GetSelectedPet() ChangeInfoTab(UISelf, 1) ViewPetEquip(g_pilotMan:GetPlayerPilotGuid()) SetPetInfoToUI(UISelf:GetParent():GetControl("FRM_PET_INFO"), kUnit:GetSelectedPet()) end

FORM.SCRIPT: local kSelf = UISelf kSelf:Visible(true) local kPilot = g_pilotMan:GetPlayerPilot(); if kPilot:IsNil() == false then local kUnit = kPilot:GetUnit() SetCharInfoToUI(kSelf, kUnit:GetGuid()) end

local kWnd = UISelf:GetParent() local kPos = kWnd:GetSize() kPos:SetY(566) kWnd:SetSize(kPos)
kWnd = kWnd:GetControl("FRM_GUIDE_TEXT") kPos = kWnd:GetLocation() kPos:SetY(538) kWnd:SetLocation(kPos)
local idx = UISelf:GetUVIndex() if idx > 28 then idx = idx + 22 end CallMutableToolTipText(GetTT(30000 + idx), GetUIWnd("Cursor"):GetLocation())

STATIC_FORM.SCRIPT: local Str = ViewPlusAbilValue(UISelf) if Str:IsNil() then return end if(GetLocale() == LOCALE.NC_TAIWAN) then CallToolTipText( 0, Str, GetUIWnd("Cursor"):GetLocation()) else CallMutableToolTipText(Str, GetUIWnd("Cursor"):GetLocation()) end

local Str = ViewPlusAbilValue(UISelf) if Str:IsNil() then return end if(GetLocale() == LOCALE.NC_TAIWAN) then CallToolTipText( 0, Str, GetUIWnd("Cursor"):GetLocation()) else CallMutableToolTipText(Str, GetUIWnd("Cursor"):GetLocation()) end

FORM.SCRIPT:
local kWnd = UISelf:GetParent() local kPos = kWnd:GetSize() kPos:SetY(532) kWnd:SetSize(kPos)
kWnd = kWnd:GetControl("FRM_GUIDE_TEXT") kPos = kWnd:GetLocation() kPos:SetY(502) kWnd:SetLocation(kPos)

local kWnd = UISelf:GetParent() local kPos = kWnd:GetSize() kPos:SetY(532) kWnd:SetSize(kPos)
kWnd = kWnd:GetControl("FRM_GUIDE_TEXT") kPos = kWnd:GetLocation() kPos:SetY(502) kWnd:SetLocation(kPos)

BUTTON.SCRIPT: if IsPetAlive(g_pilotMan:GetPlayerPilot()) then CallPetRenameChk(g_UseItemForChangeName) else CommonMsgBoxByTextTable( 364, true ) end

OnClickDyeingBtn()
local kParent = UISelf:GetParent() local kEffectFrm = kParent:GetControl("FRM_EFFECT_MODEL") kEffectFrm:Visible(true)

IMG.SCRIPT: local kPetSelf = UISelf local kPetBuildIdx = kPetSelf:GetParent():GetBuildIndex() kPetSelf:SetStaticText(GetTextW(126+kPetBuildIdx):GetStr()) kPetSelf:SetUVIndex( kPetBuildIdx+1 ) UI_T_Y_ToCenter(UISelf)
UI_T_Y_ToCenter(UISelf) -- local kPetSelf = UISelf local kPetBuildIdx = kPetSelf:GetBuildIndex() kPetSelf:SetStaticTextW(GetTextW(g_PetItemSetInfo[kPetBuildIdx]["TTW"]))

BUTTON.SCRIPT: if 100==UISelf:GetBuildIndex() then UISelf:SetStaticTextW(GetTT(3010)) else UISelf:SetStaticTextW(GetTT(1804)) end

STATIC_FORM.SCRIPT: local iData = UISelf:GetCustomDataAsInt() if iData>0 then CallToolTipText(0, GetTextW(380), GetUIWnd("Cursor"):GetLocation()) end
local Str = ViewPlusAbilValue(UISelf) if Str:IsNil() then return end CallToolTipText( 0, Str, GetUIWnd("Cursor"):GetLocation())
local Str = ViewPlusAbilValue(UISelf) if Str:IsNil() then return end CallToolTipText( 0, Str, GetUIWnd("Cursor"):GetLocation())

EDIT.SCRIPT: local Str = UISelf:GetStaticText() if Str == nil or Str:IsNil() then return end UpdateEditInputInfo(UISelf, 1)

FORM.SCRIPT: local OverImg = UISelf:GetControl("IMG_SELECT") if not OverImg:IsNil() then if 2 == OverImg:GetUVIndex() then OverImg:SetUVIndex(1) end end

IMG.SCRIPT: CallStyleItemToolTip(UISelf) local b = true local cur = UISelf:GetParent():GetControl("IMG_CURSOR") if false == cur:IsNil() then cur:Visible(b) if b then local pos = UISelf:GetLocation() pos:SetX(pos:GetX()-1) pos:SetY(pos:GetY()-1) cur:SetLocation(pos) end end
